name: MCP Client
natural_language_description: 这是 MCP Client 节点。主要用于: Standalone MCP Client

serverTransport.name: serverTransport
serverTransport.description: The transport used by your endpoint
serverTransport.natural_language_description: 参数名: Server Transport | 作用: The transport used by your endpoint | 默认值: httpStreamable

endpointUrl.name: endpointUrl
endpointUrl.description: The URL of the MCP server to connect to
endpointUrl.natural_language_description: 参数名: MCP Endpoint URL | 作用: The URL of the MCP server to connect to | (必填项)

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.description: The way to authenticate with your endpoint
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 作用: The way to authenticate with your endpoint | 默认值: none

tool.name: tool
tool.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool | 作用: The tool to use | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

inputMode.name: inputMode
inputMode.natural_language_description: 参数名: Input Mode | 默认值: manual
available_options: Manual (值: manual) - Manually specify the input data for each tool parameter
JSON (值: json) - Specify the input data as a JSON object

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.natural_language_description: 参数名: Parameters | 默认值: {'mappingMode': 'defineBelow', 'value': None} | (必填项)

jsonInput.name: jsonInput

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 作用: Additional options to add | 默认值: {}
available_options: convertToBinary (值: None) - Whether to convert images and audio to binary data. If false, images and audio will be returned as base64 encoded strings.
timeout (值: None) - Time in ms to wait for tool calls to finish
